Member Function Documentation

virtual FunctionParameterBase::operator double (  )  [inline, virtual]

cast to double is defined here because it is the most common case

operator double() cannot be abstract because FunctionParameter objects are going to be stored in a std::map, and map doesn't allow abstact types as its mapped type. Thus, a dummy function.
